languages.text: {n}Впервые вы видите на лице Хротко удивление.{/n} "Вы... милуете меня? Я... признаюсь, ожидал большей строгости. Благодарю вас, я запомню этот поступок". {n}Блюститель кланяется.{/n}

{n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Впервые вы видите на лице Хротко удивление.{/n} "Вы... милуете меня? Я... признаюсь, ожидал большей строгости. Благодарю вас, я запомню этот поступок". {n}Блюститель кланяется.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}For the first time you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You… are pardoning me? I must confess I expected a severe punishment. Thank you, I will remember this act of leniency." {n}The enforcer bows.{/n}
{n}Hrotko is avoiding your gaze. As he is escorted past Sauerback, she whispers something in his ear, and the colour drains from the enforcer's face.{/n}

{n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You… are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}The enforcer bows.{/n}

{n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You… are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}The enforcer bows.{/n}

{n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

{n}For the first time you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You… are pardoning me? I must confess I expected a severe punishment. Thank you, I will remember this act of leniency." {n}The enforcer bows.{/n}

{n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

{n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour la première fois depuis que vous le connaissez, Hrotko semble pris au dépourvu.{/n} « Vous... vous me pardonnez, vraiment ? Je dois avouer que je m'attendais à un châtiment exemplaire. Merci. Je n'oublierai pas votre clémence. » {n}Il s'incline.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour la première fois depuis que vous le connaissez, Hrotko semble pris au dépourvu.{/n} « Vous... vous me pardonnez, vraiment ? Je dois avouer que je m'attendais à un châtiment exemplaire. Merci. Je n'oublierai pas votre clémence. » {n}Il s'incline.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por primera vez, ves sorpresa en el rostro de Hrotko.{/n} «Me... ¿perdona? Debo admitir que esperaba un castigo más severo. Gracias, no olvidaré su misericordia». {n}Te hace una reverencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por primera vez, ves sorpresa en el rostro de Hrotko.{/n} «Me... ¿perdona? Debo admitir que esperaba un castigo más severo. Gracias, no olvidaré su misericordia». {n}Te hace una reverencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}赫洛卡露出了惊讶的表情，这还是你第一次在他的脸上看到这样的表情。{/n}“您……您要原谅我吗？我必须承认，我本以为会受到非常严厉的惩罚。谢谢您，大人，我会铭记您的仁慈。”{n}他鞠了一躬。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赫洛卡露出了惊讶的表情，这还是你第一次在他的脸上看到这样的表情。{/n}“您……您要原谅我吗？我必须承认，我本以为会受到非常严厉的惩罚。谢谢您，大人，我会铭记您的仁慈。”{n}他鞠了一躬。{/n}

languages.text: {n}この時初めて、あなたはフロトコの顔に驚きの色を見た。{/n}「私を…お許しになると？正直に言って、厳しい罰を受けるものと思っていました。ありがとうございます。陛下の寛大なご厚意は忘れません」{n}彼は頭を下げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この時初めて、あなたはフロトコの顔に驚きの色を見た。{/n}「私を…お許しになると？正直に言って、厳しい罰を受けるものと思っていました。ありがとうございます。陛下の寛大なご厚意は忘れません」{n}彼は頭を下げる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst zum ersten Mal einen überraschten Ausdruck auf Hrotkos Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr ... begnadigt mich? Ich muss gestehen, ich hatte eine harte Bestrafung erwartet. Danke. Ich werde diesen Akt der Gnade nicht vergessen." {n}Er verbeugt sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst zum ersten Mal einen überraschten Ausdruck auf Hrotkos Gesicht.{/n} "Ihr ... begnadigt mich? Ich muss gestehen, ich hatte eine harte Bestrafung erwartet. Danke. Ich werde diesen Akt der Gnade nicht vergessen." {n}Er verbeugt sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hrotko'nun yüzünde ilk defa şaşkınlık ifadesi görüyorsun.{/n} "Beni... Bağışlıyor musunuz? İtiraf edeyim daha ağır bir ceza beklemiştim. Teşekkür ederim. Gösterdiğiniz bu müsamahayı unutmayacağım." {n}Önünde eğiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}For the first time, you see the look of surprise on Hrotko's face.{/n} "You... are pardoning me? I must confess, I expected a severe punishment. Thank you. I will remember this act of leniency." {n}He bows.{/n}
